original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=5 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-11-05 01:25:39' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-09 07:14:12' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.BountyAmount<=100 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.Views<=13
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.BountyAmount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(votes.BountyAmount AS INTEGER) <= 100 AND votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 00:00:00'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2 AND (CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-11-05 01:25:39' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 07:14:12')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 5)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) <= 13
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E4E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E4E3E2.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E3E2E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E3E2E5.UserId)
